title: Add a new TestBackwardsCompatibility index for flex backwards (a 3.0 one with also numeric fields)
description: In flex we change also the encode/decoder for numeric fields (NumericTokenSteam) using BytesRef and also the collation filters. We should add a test index from 3.0 that contains these fields and do some validation, that field contents did not change when read with flex.

comments.content: Here the patech that test numeric fields generated by lucene 3.0. With the coming updates to numeric fields to use byte[] this will ensure that the index is compatible.
comments.author: Uwe Schindler

comments.content: Add a range for all docs to check if lower-prec terms are also ok
